name: Pathway Puzzles
description:
Pathway Puzzles:

Controls:  Use your mouse to click and drag from the sphere to start drawing a path.  Click and drag from any point on the path to edit an already created path.  To begin moving along the path press the Spacebar.  Drawing through or outside of walls will stop the path from being draw until you touch the path or player again.

Goal:  Move the sphere from the start of the level to the end while avoiding obstacles.
